verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> that <S%H6>destroy<s%> and <S%H6327>scatter<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of my <S%H4830>pasture<s%>! <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, against the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> that <S%H7462>feed<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%>: Ye have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> my <S%H6629>flock<s%>, and driven them <S%H5080>away<s%>, and have not <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H6485>them<s%>; behold, I will visit upon you the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of my <S%H6629>flock<s%> out of all the <S%H776>countries<s%> whither I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> <S%H7725>them<s%>, and will bring them again to their <S%H5116>folds<s%>; and they shall be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%>.

And I will set <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> over <S%H7462>them<s%>, who shall feed <S%H3372>them<s%>; and they shall fear no <S%H2865>more<s%>, nor be dismayed, neither shall any be <S%H6485>lacking<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Behold <S%H3117><s%>, the days <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that I will <S%H6965>raise<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6780>Branch<s%>, and he shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> as <S%H4428>king<s%> and deal <S%H7919>wisely<s%>, and shall <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

In his <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%>; and this is his <S%H8034>name<s%> whereby he shall be <S%H7121>called<s%>: Jehovah our <S%H3072>righteousness<s%>.

Therefore <S%H3117><s%>, behold, the days <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that they shall no more <S%H559>say<s%>, As <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, who brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>;

but <S%H3068><s%>, As Jehovah <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, who brought <S%H5927>up<s%> and who <S%H935>led<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>, and from all the <S%H776>countries<s%> whither I had <S%H5080>driven<s%> <S%H3427>them<s%>. And they shall dwell in their own <S%H127>land<s%>.

Concerning the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>. My <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me is <S%H7665>broken<s%>, all my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H7363>shake<s%>; I am like a <S%H7910>drunken<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, and like a <S%H1397>man<s%> whom <S%H3196>wine<s%> hath <S%H5674>overcome<s%>, <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and because of his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>.

For the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H5003>adulterers<s%>; for <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H423>swearing<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourneth<s%>; the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> are dried <S%H3001>up<s%>. And their <S%H4794>course<s%> is <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and their might is not <S%H1369>right<s%>;

for both <S%H5030>prophet<s%> and <S%H3548>priest<s%> are <S%H2610>profane<s%>; <S%H1004>yea<s%>, in my house have I <S%H4672>found<s%> their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Wherefore their <S%H1870>way<s%> shall be unto them as <S%H2519>slippery<s%> places in the <S%H653>darkness<s%>: they shall be driven <S%H1760>on<s%>, and <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H935>therein<s%>; for I will bring <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon <S%H8141>them<s%>, even the year of their <S%H6486>visitation<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H8604>folly<s%> in the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>; they <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> by <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and caused my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H8582>err<s%>.

In the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> also I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> a horrible <S%H8186>thing<s%>: they commit <S%H5003>adultery<s%>, and <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H8267>lies<s%>; and they <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H7489>evil-doers<s%>, so that <S%H376>none<s%> doth <S%H7725>return<s%> from his <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>: they are all of them become unto me as <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof as <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> concerning the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>: <S%H398>Behold<s%>, I will feed them with <S%H3939>wormwood<s%>, and make them <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H7219>gall<s%>; for from the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> is <S%H2613>ungodliness<s%> gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> into all the <S%H776>land<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, <S%H8085>Hearken<s%> not unto the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> unto <S%H1891>you<s%>: they teach you vanity; they <S%H1696>speak<s%> a <S%H2377>vision<s%> of their own <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and not out of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

They <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H559>continually<s%> unto them that <S%H5006>despise<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, Jehovah hath <S%H1696>said<s%>, Ye shall have <S%H7965>peace<s%>; and unto every one that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of his own <S%H3820>heart<s%> they <S%H559>say<s%>, No <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall come upon <S%H935>you<s%>.

For who hath <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H5475>council<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that he should <S%H7200>perceive<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>? who hath <S%H7181>marked<s%> my <S%H1697>word<s%>, and heard <S%H8085>it<s%>?

Behold <S%H5591><s%>, the tempest of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, even his <S%H2534>wrath<s%>, is gone <S%H3318>forth<s%>, <S%H2342>yea<s%>, a whirling <S%H5591>tempest<s%>: it shall <S%H2342>burst<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.

The <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall not <S%H7725>return<s%>, until he have <S%H6213>executed<s%>, and till he have <S%H6965>performed<s%> the <S%H4209>intents<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart<s%>: in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> ye shall <S%H995>understand<s%> it <S%H998>perfectly<s%>.
I <S%H7971>sent<s%> not these <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, yet they <S%H7323>ran<s%>: I <S%H1696>spake<s%> not unto <S%H5012>them<s%>, yet they prophesied.

But if they had <S%H5975>stood<s%> in my <S%H5475>council<s%>, then had they caused my <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%>, and had <S%H7725>turned<s%> them from their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, and from the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of their <S%H4611>doings<s%>.
Am I a <S%H430>God<s%> at <S%H7138>hand<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and not a <S%H430>God<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>?

Can <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> himself in secret <S%H4565>places<s%> so that I shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5002>him<s%>? saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. Do not I <S%H4392>fill<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%>? <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> what the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> have <S%H559>said<s%>, that <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> in my <S%H8034>name<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I have <S%H2492>dreamed<s%>, I have <S%H2492>dreamed<s%>.

How long shall this <S%H3426>be<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%>, even the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of the <S%H8649>deceit<s%> of their own <S%H3820>heart<s%>?

that <S%H2803>think<s%> to cause my <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H7911>forget<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> by their <S%H2472>dreams<s%> which they <S%H5608>tell<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, as their <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H7911>forgat<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal<s%>.

The <S%H5030>prophet<s%> that hath a <S%H2472>dream<s%>, let him <S%H5608>tell<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%>; and he that hath my <S%H1697>word<s%>, let him <S%H1696>speak<s%> my <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H571>faithfully<s%>. What is the <S%H8401>straw<s%> to the <S%H1250>wheat<s%>? <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Is not my <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H3541>like<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>? <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and like a <S%H6360>hammer<s%> that <S%H6327>breaketh<s%> the <S%H5553>rock<s%> in <S%H6327>pieces<s%>?

Therefore <S%H5030><s%>, behold, I am against the prophets, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that <S%H1589>steal<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> from his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>.
Behold <S%H5030><s%>, I am against the prophets, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that <S%H3947>use<s%> their <S%H3956>tongues<s%>, and <S%H5001>say<s%>, He <S%H5002>saith<s%>.

Behold <S%H5012><s%>, I am against them that prophesy <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H2472>dreams<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and do <S%H5608>tell<s%> <S%H5971>them<s%>, and cause my people to <S%H8582>err<s%> by their <S%H8267>lies<s%>, and by their vain <S%H6350>boasting<s%>: yet I <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H6680>not<s%>, nor commanded <S%H3276>them<s%>; neither do they profit this <S%H5971>people<s%> at <S%H3276>all<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And when this <S%H5971>people<s%>, or the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, or a <S%H3548>priest<s%>, shall <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H559>thee<s%>, saying, What is the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>? then shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H4853>them<s%>, What burden! I will <S%H5203>cast<s%> you <S%H5002>off<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And as for the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that shall <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, I will even <S%H6485>punish<s%> that <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

Thus shall ye <S%H559>say<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, and every <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H251>brother<s%>, What hath <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%>? <S%H3068>and<s%>, What hath Jehovah <S%H1696>spoken<s%>?

And the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall ye <S%H2142>mention<s%> no <S%H376>more<s%>: for every man's own <S%H1697>word<s%> shall be his <S%H4853>burden<s%>; for ye have <S%H2015>perverted<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>.
Thus shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, What hath <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3068>thee<s%>? and, What hath Jehovah <S%H1696>spoken<s%>?

But <S%H518><s%> if ye <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: Because ye <S%H559>say<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%>, The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, Ye shall not <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>;

therefore <S%H5377><s%>, behold, I will utterly <S%H5382>forget<s%> <S%H5203>you<s%>, and I will cast you <S%H5892>off<s%>, and the city that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto you and to your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, away from my <S%H6440>presence<s%>:
and I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2781>reproach<s%> upon <S%H5769>you<s%>, and a perpetual <S%H3640>shame<s%>, which shall not be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%>.
